Text: Visit to Enron week of you heard of these guys Jim Forwarded by James B FallonHOUECT on AM mcahill herecom on PM To cc Eric Berkowitz herecom Jeffrey Wei herecom Subject Visit to Enron week of Dear MrFallon As we discussed I think that several of your corporate staff people will be interested in discussing our rapidly developing situation Our President and I will be in Texas next week and I would like to firm up the visit with you on Thursdaymorning will contact your secretary to finalize the details on Monday morning I am the Vice President of Research at Uhere Corp in San Jose We are creating a comprehensive regulated clearinghouseenabled web based futures exchange for a wide variety of BB trading sites Our exchange will allowEnronto hedge and offset trading positions thatithastaken in power or bandwidth and could substantially increaseEnronstrading volume and liquidity We are looking for a tradermarketer likeEnron to partner with us in the electricity andor bandwidth markets The objective is to create a new kind of financial entity for Risk Management Currently we are testing our trading software We have a large collocated IBM system here in San Jose Our regulatory attorneys are moving ahead rapidly with our CFTC application and our clearinghouse is now coming into focus We expect to be able to sell contracts within weeks At this early stage we are quite flexible in the kinds of partnering arrangements that we will consider As I indicated to you our Chairman is Mr Bob Greber formerly Chairman at the Pacific Exchange and our regulatory attorneys are Farella Braun Martel LLP Would you be kind enough to inform others withEnron ofour visit others who might be interested inusing our situation to amplify Enronscapabilities Best regards Michael J Cahill Vice President Research Uhere Corp N nd St Suite San Jose CA Tele X Cell
